jobs.title: Vue Developer
jobs.details: Chuck Norris is the reason why Waldo is hiding. Chuck Norris doesn't churn butter. He roundhouse kicks the cows and the butter comes straight out. There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of animals Chuck Norris allows to live. The Great Wall of China was originally created to keep Chuck Norris out. It failed miserably.
